name: Paracetamol
uses: Fever reduction; relief of mild to moderate pain
side_effects: Nausea; rash; liver toxicity at high doses

name: Amoxicillin
uses: Treats bacterial infections like sinusitis and bronchitis

name: Cetirizine
uses: Relieves allergy symptoms like sneezing and itching

name: Pantoprazole
uses: Reduces stomach acid for GERD and ulcers

name: Azithromycin
uses: Treats bacterial infections like respiratory and skin infections
